channel.title: Emotes!
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm using a devolution 7.0 server source and i would like to change the names of my emotes. Please do not tell me to search the emote name and change because i know for a fact that isn't how you do it in a devolution source.
All help is appreciated.
Thanx :)

item.title: Emotes!
item.dc:creator: @R4ND0M R4ND0M
item.description:
@R4ND0M wrote:

do you have a “texthandler.java” file in the source? if you do, search in it for “yes” (with quote marks) or “” (same)… the one you chose depends on the first tab of your emotes: if it says “yes” for your first emote, search for that; if nothing in the first tab, search for “”

Read full topic

item.title: Emotes!
item.dc:creator: @mopa_got_owned mopa got owned
item.description:
@mopa_got_owned wrote:

Oh sorry, I thought you said how do you change the emote ID lol. I’m a little tired.

Read full topic

item.title: Emotes!
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

No that isn’t the way im afraid, you can chnage many things but not its name.

Read full topic

item.title: Emotes!
item.dc:creator: @mopa_got_owned mopa got owned
item.description:
@mopa_got_owned wrote:

Search for the cases. And boom done. I won’t tell you what cases, because you SHOULD know how to find out cases before attempting to take on a server.

Read full topic
